results.description: Bath fight back from conceding a try in the opening minute to defeat previously unbeaten Northampton.

results.title: Premiership: Bath survive red card to topple leaders Saints

results.description: Northampton and England hooker Dylan Hartley retires from professional rugby after failing to recover from a long-term knee injury.
results.title: Dylan Hartley: England and Northampton Saints hooker retires because of injury

thumbnail.altText: Dylan Hartley with the Six Nations and Grand Slam trophies

results.description: Bath face Northampton, Gloucester take on Saracens and Worcester travel to Harlequins in the Premiership & Bedford v Newcastle in the Championship.

results.description: Taqele Naiyaravoro and Teimana Harrison score braces of tries as Northampton Saints brush aside Harlequins at Franklin's Gardens.

results.description: Northampton rally to score five second-half tries and beat Worcester in tough conditions at Franklin's Gardens.

results.description: Northampton and South Africa flanker Heinrich Brussow announces his retirement following a string of injuries.

results.description: James Grayson kicks a last-minute penalty as Northampton upstage Premiership champions Saracens in their season opener.
